HeistHUD_assault_2: Haha, your payday is haunted, haha
HeistHUD_assault_5: How long is this ticker anyway?
HeistHUD_assault_6: That's the alarm guys, it's on now
HeistHUD_assault_7: Payday 2 Won't have Microtransactions (Shame on you if you thought otherwise!)
HeistHUD_assault_8: Someone tell command we are not prepared for this kind of engagement
HeistHUD_assault_9: Guys, the thermal drill. Go get it
HeistHUD_assault_13: The Dark Souls of heist games
HeistHUD_assault_14: Do not try this in real life
HeistHUD_assault_16: You cheated by using invalid weapon or weapon mod
HeistHUD_assault_17: You cheated by using invalid mask
HeistHUD_assault_18: You cheated by using invalid character
HeistHUD_assault_21: You have been kicked from the game
HeistHUD_assault_22: The secret assault message is cosmetic
HeistHUD_assault_23: Do they not have coloured printers in Russia?
HeistHUD_hud_scale_desc: Set the scale of every hud element together. Elements can also be resized separately
HeistHUD_reset_desc: Reset every option to their default configuration
HeistHUD_reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset HeistHUD to the default configuration? This can not be undone.
HeistHUD_hudteammate_desc: Options related to the main player and teammates panels
HeistHUD_main_scale_desc: Set the scale of the player hud panel element
HeistHUD_main_health_desc: Define how numerical health is shown inside your health bar. PERCENTAGE shows your health as a percentage of your total health, REAL VALUE shows the actual amount of health points you have
HeistHUD_armor_desc: Define how numerical armor is shown inside your health bar. PERCENTAGE shows your armor as a percentage of your total armor, REAL VALUE shows the actual amount of armor points you have
HeistHUD_total_decs: Show the amount of ammo you have in reserve instead of your total ammo
HeistHUD_main_loud_desc: Show the amount of downs you have left before you go to custody (loud only)
HeistHUD_main_stealth_desc: Show the amount of body bags you have left (stealth only)
HeistHUD_ammo_pickup_desc: Show the amount of ammo you've picked up
HeistHUD_mate_scale_desc: Set the scale of the teammate hud elements
HeistHUD_mate_health_desc: Define how numerical health is shown inside your teammates' health bar. PERCENTAGE shows health as a percentage of the total health, REAL VALUE shows the actual amount of health points
HeistHUD_mate_loud_desc: Show the amount of downs your teammates' have left before they go to custody (loud only)
HeistHUD_mate_stealth_desc: Show your teammates' detection risk in their respective health bars (stealth only)
HeistHUD_mate_name_desc: Show your teammates' infamy rank and player level before their name
HeistHUD_mate_interact_desc: Show the remaining time from your teammates' interaction
HeistHUD_objectives_desc: Options related to the timer panel and the objectives panel
HeistHUD_objectives_scale_desc: Set the scale of both the timer and the objectives elements
HeistHUD_levelname_desc: Show the name of the current day of the heist
HeistHUD_ghost_desc: Show a ghost icon on stealthable levels. Turns red if stealth is failed
HeistHUD_objective_history_desc: Set the maximum amount of past objectives that can appear on the hud
HeistHUD_assault_desc: Options related to the assault panel
HeistHUD_assault_scale_desc: Set the scale the assault panel element
HeistHUD_badge_desc: Show a fancy police badge during assaults
HeistHUD_badge_anim_desc: Animate the police badge with a fancy 'pulse' effect
HeistHUD_chat_desc: Options related to the player chat
HeistHUD_chat_scale_desc: Set the scale of the player chat
HeistHUD_chat_mouse_desc: Enable mouse support for the chat. With mouse enabled you can scroll easier and copy messages
HeistHUD_charactername_desc: Show what heister the message's sender is playing as
HeistHUD_chattime_desc: Show the time messages were sent at. GAME TIME is the time since the start of the current heist day, REAL TIME is the time in real life
HeistHUD_chat_copy_desc: Enable copying chat messages to the clipboard by right clicking on them, and set what to copy
HeistHUD_label_desc: Options related to the floating labels and waypoints
HeistHUD_jokernames_desc: Add name labels for converted cops
HeistHUD_label_scale_desc: Set the scale of the name labels
HeistHUD_label_minscale_desc: Set the scale of the name labels in minimal mode
HeistHUD_minlabel_desc: Name labels will become smaller when their owner is far away from you or you're not looking at them
HeistHUD_minrank_title: Show rank and level in minmode
HeistHUD_minrank_desc: Show your teammates' infamy rank and player level when theit label is in minimal mode
HeistHUD_mindist_desc: Set the distance in meters after which the name labels should enter minimal mode
HeistHUD_mindot_desc: The scale of the area in the middle of the screen that forces labels out of minimal mode
HeistHUD_waypoint_scale_desc: Set the scale of the objective waypoints and awareness markers
HeistHUD_waypoint_radius_desc: The size of the circle waypoints gets displayed on when their source is out of view
HeistHUD_waypoint_offscreen_desc: Show waypoints when their source is out of view
